title: Ranked Team for 2017
body:
Hi guys I'm looking to create a Ranked team for 2017 looking to practice in the pre-season I am a Gold 5 adc/mid main. Looking for a complete team bar adc with pro-active players that seek to play as often as possible.

Requirements: Discord, working comms (headset), above the age of 16, pro-active approach to getting games started, positive attitude and the desire to learn

While I am looking to make this a serious team I would rather a positive attitude and willingness to learn and accept mistakes over skill. I'm in for the long haul so please only add me/reply if you are willing to go for the long haul.

replies.body:
hey, i'm super keen for a team that takes things a little more seriously and wants to improve. i understand i wont get accepted straight away, and that my s5 rank doesn't appear to be top quality as a first impression, but i'm willing to try out synergy in norms or ranked prior to you choosing team members.

cheers,
span.
p.s i was in s1 but i havent played regularly for a few months seeing as im moving houses. ill be able to play a lot more and get back into the groove very soon.
